title: Mike Wilson: New Data Sends Concerning Signs for U.S. Stocks
description: On today's podcast, Chief Investment Officer Mike Wilson says a popular narrative forecasted a rebound for the second half of 2019. However, new data on lower U.S. factory activity could counter that expectation.
